name: Bountiful Booty
description:
And now here you be, watching as Isla de Valencia turns from a speck on the far horizon to a bustling pirate town, nestled in a calm bay and well hidden by cove and cannon.

What awaits you on this island? Love, adventure or be it another wasted venture?

Play and find out, in Bountiful Booty!

Credits:

Erin Hutton: Project Lead and Manger, Writer & Developer

Daniel Burke: Art Lead, UI & Environment Artist, Writer & Concept Artist

Aleksandra Klosowski: Character Artist

Vongani Mbombi: Writer
